title: Microlearning Based on Emergency Airway Management Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Fundamental CPR (Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation) Knowledge
context.additional_context: Strengthening integrated emergency situation awareness-execution capabilities through 4C/ID model-based simulation training

learning_goals: Perform emergency airway management procedures (airway assessment → oxygen administration → endotracheal intubation) in a simulation environment with 80% accuracy within 10 minutes
In time-pressured situations, recognize changes in patient condition and apply appropriate clinical judgments (e.g., timing of medication administration) three or more times
Execute role distribution and communication protocols in team-based emergency scenarios with 90% compliance
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
